title: COVID Cases Past Their Peak? Bowl Ad Leaks 2.5.21
itunes:title: COVID Cases Past Their Peak? Bowl Ad Leaks 2.5.21
description:
In episode 806, Jack and guest host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian and Pod Yourself A Gun co-host Matt Lieb to discuss the impact of weather on covid cases, the long term effects of covid, the SAG award nominees, Brandy's Cinderella coming to Disney+, Kroger choosing to close some stores, JoJo Siwa coming out, Super Bowl ads, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Nationwide Covid Metrics
  2. The weather has a bigger impact on COVID spread than social distancing, study concludes
  3. Impact of the wind conditions on COVID-19 pandemic: A new insight for direction of the spread of the virus
  4. Effects of temperature and humidity on the spread of COVID-19: A systematic review
  5. What to Watch Tuesday: ‘Real Sports’ season premiere looks at COVID-19 ‘long haulers’
  6. 2021 SAG Awards: The Complete Nominations List
  7. Brandy’s ‘Cinderella,’ With Fairy Godmother Whitney Houston, Coming to Disney Plus
  8. Ruby Bridges discusses lifelong fight against racism during MLK celebration
  9. Kroger to close a Ralphs and Food 4 Less in Long Beach after city’s ‘hero pay’ mandate
  10. JoJo Siwa says her 'perfect' girlfriend encouraged her to come out
  11. Super Bowl 2021 ads: Here are the leaked commercials
  12. Elmo and his dad Louie talk about racism and protesting
  13. WATCH: Anthony B - Chill Out | Cali Roots Riddim 2020 (Produced by Collie Buddz)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
